quote_first: Mr. Harcourt woke up with mysterious suddenness at
quote_last: , and, by a curious coincidence, it was at that very instant that the butler came in with two footmen laden with trays of whisky, brandy, syphons, glasses, and biscuits.
title: England, Their England
author: AG Macdonell

quote_first: She is on holiday in Norfolk. The substandard clock radio says
quote_last: The noise is Katrina the Cleaner thumping the hoover against the skirting boards and the bedroom doors. Her hand is asleep. It is still hooked through the handstrap of the camera. She unhooks it and shakes it to get the blood back into it. She puts her feet on top of her trainers and slides them across the substandard carpet. It has the bare naked feet of who knows how many hundreds of dead or old people on it.
title: The Accidental
author: Ali Smith
